description:
Instant access to Search Engine Optimization building block basic's and the fundamental principles of what makes it work. Twenty-four categories that are found on most web pages that you have some control over to adjust or compare.

SEO is not black hat magic, but a calculated procedure that can be repeated by following established results. We will use our X-Ray vision to pick apart what's needed to blend in with those that have made the top ten already.

Search Engines are always trying to improve, and with that new rankings. We can look at who's ranking for what keyword phrases, both long tail and local terms, and use what their content shows us to work our way up towards them.

YOU WILL LEARN AND BE ABLE TO:

  • Identify each and every part of a pages required sections
  • Learn how not to spam your pages with overload of keyword phrases
  • Discover who your competition is, and use their own methods to blend in
  • Find old, existing domain names to buy which already beat your competition
  • Find old, existing domain names to buy that already have incoming links to them
  • Find old, existing domain names to buy and auction them off to make money
  • Discover what the top ten sites for your keyword phrase are doing right

EACH OF THE 24 GROUPS INCLUDE:

  • Its own ranking level for scoring
  • What that level of importance is based on
  • If it is considered On Page, Off Page, or Off Site
  • If you have control over the changes or others do
  • An example of the HTML code for reference
  • Best use considerations for that group
  • What you should NOT do for that group
  • The description of that group and its use
  • Most of the groups come with Tips and Advice that can help even more
title: SEO Training Complete With Its Own SEO Ranking Tool
